website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for the Star Wars super fan in your family.
pros: Each build is detailed and accurate
Long-time Star Wars fans will appreciate the well balanced mix of figures from both the new and old films
Pops of red, green and yellow make each piece stand out
The rebel snowman is an adorable tie-in to the holiday season
cons: The holiday theme is lacking compared to previous years

customer_reviews.title: NO SANTA!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. There is no Santa this year. I have purchased a Lego Advent calendar every year since they debuted, and it's been the Star Wars version ever since it came out. Only 1 other time do I recall there not being a Santa. I Back then I called and complained to Lego and the rep said that they were receiving a lot of complaints. I called again this year and the rep sent me a "Santa" to placate me. Well, it's a Santa body and hat but Geldolf hair. The Santa hat won't fit on the head. I'll be especially careful next year.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering these for many years and this one does not disappoint. Some REALLY great mini-builds. Kicking off day one with the landspeeder was brilliance and ending week one with a Naboo starfighter (which is a GREAT replica of the larger sets) was just amazing. How could it get better? Did you say RATHTAR? SOOOOO cool. First Order Tie Fighter - AMAZING! Maybe my favorite, was possibly the AT-ACT - who knew you could build one so small?!?! But wait... where's Santa? Which is why I deducted a star...
customer_reviews.author: UMS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten the Star Wars Advents calendars for at least three years. Our grandsons absolutely love them. The front of the box has a piece that folds down and sets up the Star Wars Christmas theme and is perfect for them to display each Lego piece as the countdown to Christmas continues. The daily surprise adds to the overall scene. As a side note, the Elf on the Shelf brings the calendars on his first appearance :-)
customer_reviews.author: Pat Z

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old loves it!  Add candy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Star Wars Advent calendar for my 12 year old in 7th grade. He loves it and since it's 12/16/2018, he's still enjoying it! I removed the tray and added leftover Halloween candy to each well. If you do this, just make sure you put the tray back in correctly, as the Lego build directions are on the back of each Advent calendar flap. We got this for a Black Friday /Cyber Monday price. It was a fantastic deal. He loves the little Star Wars ships, people, and accents. Awesome! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany CherryBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I get the quibbles, I guess. But sure happy I ignored them and purchased one for each of our boys. Would be nice to have a list of names and ships. Had to research descriptions, one still uncertain about. I know as a kid I would have loved receiving one of these mini Legos each day during Advent. I know our boys 5 and 3 are excited. Know I'm wondering what's in store for us the next year, and then 2020 why our youngest is old enough... Well played Lego.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Fun Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun with this set. My child got a kick out or searching for the next day, and building each model. The bags were a little tricky to open for a younger child, so I had to assist. I also helped out a bit with the building, but took it as a great opportunity to spend time with my child and show them how to read and follow directions, even if I did most of the work. I would buy again, and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: The creators of Lego are geniuses -- this advent calendar was so fun for my son. He couldn't wait to wake up every morning and open another "square" to see which legos he'd get. The legos come in little plastic bags with instructions on the inside flap of each square -- very cute, very simple and age appropriate for anyone 5 and older! I hope there will be another version of this advent calendar for next year!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Picky Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift idea for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be the best gift. Got it for my sons birthday in October. He kept it on his closer till December first and everyday since has had a day to open a little LEGO figure. At first thought it was a little expensive but seeing it every day and how the box becomes the display it definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: The Best Thing Since Sliced Bread.
customer_reviews.text: OK so lets face it we're not all religious but we love getting into the holiday thing. Oh yeah and we all love legos! And most of us, those with a pulse, love at least one Star Wars, you know like any of them that don't have JarJar in it. What better way to enjoy an entire month of your life than getting a tiny Star Wars Lego kit Every. Single. Day. It's a Win folks.
customer_reviews.author: Tad W. Theno

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time figuring out what a lot of the builds were. My 2 and 5 year old kids were excited about every item we built, but they only play with three of them now... a few weeks later. Most were set aside right after they were built. We will not choose this kind of calendar again, but the same quality bricks etc. is what we wanted and what we got.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: needs work
customer_reviews.text: We did the star wars advent calendar last year and it was decent. Despite the reviews we still enjoyed it. I can't say the same of this set this year. It lacks imagination, good pieces and fun. Definitely a huge let down. No one in the house is excited to open it because we know it's just another nameless, silly piece. Pretty big fail Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Lego Starwars for Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons think Star Wars is the in thing. All 3 of them work together getting each prize for each Advent calendar day. They have been putting these Lego calendars together for the past 3 years. The oldest is now 8 and he is the project supervisor (according to him). They don’t even miss the candy in the previous Advent calendars.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B

customer_reviews.title: Same old minifigures
customer_reviews.text: I get this every year for my kiddos and this year was a little disappointing. They were hoping for some of the newer characters. This time there wasn't really any figures that they went crazy over. I wish they would go back to adding unique characters/ builds for the advent character. That's part of what made it so special.
customer_reviews.author: genovese 1

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to candy!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second year purchasing a Lego advent calendar. It gives my seven year old son a reason to be excited in the morning, and the pieces are mostly ready for him to assemble by himself, though sometimes he still needs my help. The Friends version was more reliably an independent activity, but he LOVED the Star Wars. Count us in again next year!
customer_reviews.author: andrea c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My kids can't wait to get up every morning and put together that day's figure / ship. I think that this is a great way to count down to their favorite day of the year! Some of the limited picture directions are difficult for my 7 year old. There are extra pieces in each package that I'm not sure what we need them for...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T. Von Hoene

customer_reviews.title: cute set, but missing one piece
customer_reviews.text: The set was cute, and my son definitely loved the fact he got a new toy everyday. Unfortunately, I had opened the entire package and noticed that one of the pieces was missing from a particular day. I reached out to Lego about it and never heard a response back from them. I ended up buying a little Star Wars Lego toy to compensate for the missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: lv2rdalot

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great idea for kids. Something fun like a small present every night. Kids couldn't wait each night to open the next square. I'm going to buy some variation of this every year. Great price for all the junk inside, and for the excitement I got out of my kids each night
customer_reviews.author: Squak

customer_reviews.title: Used lego creations in bday gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this for my sons birthday to use the lego pieces for birthday bag gifts. He had 12 friends and each friend was able to have 2 lego creations to put together. They were a huge hit. My son really wanted to be able to give his friends legos to put together but I wasn't about to spend $100 just to make that happen. This was perfect for us. It would be awesome to be used as an advent calendar. Very neat!
customer_reviews.author: Janessa

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendars?
customer_reviews.text: Just a box of figures . No calendar, no directions. Nothing included to open each day. Sad waste of money, time, disappointment to grandkids. Also bought friends advent calendar with same sad box of stuff. Nothing included that made either one of them an "advent calendar ". Merry christmas. Expensive waste of money purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The one mini figure we were most excited to revive was missing and in its place was the little boy with the light saber. The mini figure we cared the least about. This was the only Christmas gift I could afford for my fiancé and seeing his disappointment on the last couple days of building was.. disappointing. Now we don’t want to reuse them as Christmas decorations each year, making the entire set simply plastic waste. I will be contacting Lego directly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves Star Wars  and legos!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this advent calendar for my nephew who is nine years old. He loved it and waited each day to take a piece out. Then his sister who is five was upset that I didn't get her one either. I bought her something else for Christmas. Also, my 14 yr old nephew liked it so much he asked me to get him when too. I thought he would be to old for it but I guess you never are told for Star Wars and legos!!!! So I had to buy two more of the Star Wars advent calender lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legos, nuff said!
customer_reviews.text: I get my daughter a Lego's Advent Calendar every year. She's 23 and I think this is still her favourite part of Christmas. I've tried other Advent Calendars, including ones with money, candy and jewelry in them, but she loves the Lego's calendar the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing this because all the LEGO builds are tiny. I have a 3 year old and a 6 year old. Neither of them mind the size or ease of the builds. They can't wait to open them. There are 24 builds all together. I have 2 kids and one kit. So we just do the 12 days of Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: there is no way to hang the minifigures on a christmas tree.
customer_reviews.text: the advent calendar I bought last year had holes on each figure to attach a string or hanger on it to hang on a mini Christmas tree. Grandson did not like this years advent calendar as much as last year.
customer_reviews.author: hllbllr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  non-chocolate Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my kids every year. It's like those Advent calendars with chocolate in them. Each day is numbered until Christmas. Instead of chocolate, they get a mini figure or object that relates to Christmas and the box it comes in. Keeps sugar levels down, and which kid doesn't like Lego?
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance Mgr

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS find! I order this every year for Advent***
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find !! I get my little guy this every year from Amazon. He absolutely loves opening this calendar every day. The items are just right for little fingers too. Only thing, I wish it wasn't always Star Wars. I hope they think of another theme next year!!**
customer_reviews.author: Erinmarie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: No idea what I'm going to do with all the little builds once we are done, but my partner and I are absolutely loving opening these up every evening. Each day's build only takes a few moments to put together (some of the diagrams are a little hard to see/ follow), and it's a nice thing for the two of us to do as a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Elisia Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be Christmas Without This
customer_reviews.text: Our boys (9 and 12 years old) absolutely love these lego Advent calendars. It has become a Christmas tradition for the past couple of years, and will continue as long as Lego continues to make them. My boys, even at their age, recognize that these mini builds and minifigures hold a high value because you can only get them with these annual calendars. I imagine my boys will be sharing these memories with their kids someday.
customer_reviews.author: IceStorm

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, needs traditional layout.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. Our grandson loved opening a new LEGO everyday waiting for Christmas. The layout was confusing, though. He’s learning to count his numbers, and they weren’t in order as normal advent calendars are, but were scattered. It was harder to see the actual countdown to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Granstra

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is fun and my kids love them. It’s annoying to find mini sets sitting around they don’t care about ~2 minutes after they’ve been put together but if you like seeing the joy on your child’s face for about 5 minutes and like blowing money on wasteful toys, this is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Grzymkowski

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son thinks this is really cool, but I think it’s really hard. Most of the sets don’t even look like much of anything to me. I guess they are ships? There are no instructions so I’ve ended up having to help him with 80% of them.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Same old Advent
customer_reviews.text: Lego doesn't vary these by much year to year and they are getting a bit old. This will probably be the last we get for our son especially after Funco released the Harry Potter one last year. We will seek better options for 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It just a cardboard box with a tray of toys inside - One time use
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed, this is just a cardboard box. I was hoping it would be something reusable year after year, a bit more durable, a tradition thing. I'm jot sure 24 figures are worth the cost to simply be revealed in a cardboard box with perf tabs to be torn open.
customer_reviews.author: Ryusho

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this Lego tradition
customer_reviews.text: It may be a little pricey, but my kids (big and small) love this Lego tradition. The individual sets are tiny and a bit hokey. Compared to other Lego products it's definitely not that great, but as an advent calendar, it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: daimomof3

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced disappointment. No directions included and there is a brown mat pictured on the box which is not included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars + Christmas = Awesome Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these advent calendars and it's one of our Christmas traditions. It's so fun to see what he builds every day and he really looks forward to it every day during December. Fun pieces and they differ each year.
customer_reviews.author: Heddy J.

customer_reviews.title: 24 fun designs
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the LEGO advent calendar. I got one for myself and one for my nephew. We kept in touch as we opened each day and discussed what we had made. I liked the surprises and all the innovative builds. We got a few mini figures and a lot of cool Star Wars builds.
customer_reviews.author: Dewback

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it as usual
customer_reviews.text: Of course, it doesn't have as many mini figs as he'd like. And for the second year in a row we've had an item that didn't match the instructions so we had to contact LEGO to get the right one. They sent it out within a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a while
customer_reviews.text: These daily legos were an excellent motivator for my son to do well in school every day but after he found Rowan (which took awhile) the fun was over. There was a lot of ships he wasn't that excited about but still fun for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Viri Ingham

customer_reviews.title: Always fun and now with a surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my adult sons who have grown up with LOGOs. I told them last year I was done buying them LEGOs for Christmas. Then I found the Advent Calender! I shipped each of them this set and they loved building something new each day. You can grow a boy into a man but you cannot remove LEGO from his life! This is a gift for many years to come :)
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is a lego finatic. He absolutely loved getting up every morning and opening that days door and not knowing what he would find behind it. I will definitely buy another this Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: Our elf brought this to our son on December 1. My son loved opening each door every day and looked forward to playing and putting the pieces together. It doesn't come with directions, just a picture on how to put it together so my 7 year old son needed help with a few pieces. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Kids love gifts, LEGOs and Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they loved it. They enjoyed the fact that they could open one each day all the way up to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Vipers 480

customer_reviews.title: son is happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little annoyed to have to pay $35 for this but it was my fault for waiting so long. My son has loved opening a lego calendar vs the standard chocolate one he usually got. Worth the money spent for sure next here I will be sure to order sooner. He has had no issue putting the pieces together and is having a blast playing with everything
customer_reviews.author: Christie Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great set, Lego did great again.
customer_reviews.text: LEGO sets are always perfect, this set was great as it came with several extra and unique pieces. My kids loved opening each of these sets. Comes packaged inside 24 individual compartments each inside their own door.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: We get one every year
customer_reviews.text: We get the new LEGO advent calendar every year. Whatever is the “new one” is next years. We have lots of fun with it and save the extra parts. It’s a fun holiday tradition for LEGO enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: A Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool idea. My son bought it for himself and just can’t wait to open up a new door every morning. Not sure what Star Wars has to do with Jesus’ birth, but it’s a really cool idea. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite of any year
customer_reviews.text: Least favorite of any year. It had no whimsy of the past, no fun, no humor, and no camp. My kid, a Star Wars and LEGO freak, lost interest so it’s sitting on a shelf 1/2 unopened.
customer_reviews.author: MsFancyPantz

customer_reviews.title: Son is happy so that is good in my book
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the days had odd figures we had to look up to see what they were supposed to be. But my son didn't care. His feet hit the floor every morning and headed straight to the calendar to make his daily figure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves legos
customer_reviews.text: It was neat opening one each day but it was a lot of ships and hardly any mini figures. I also wish they would have put the instructions in the little pockets instead of the door flap.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Tradition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephews last Christmas and they loved it so I had to buy it again this year. They love counting down to Christmas Day and this gives them extra fun and LEGO surprise each day.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not obvious how the advent part works
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this from the elf on day 1. They got up before us and had no idea it was an advent calendar. Every box was open by the time I came downstairs. But 4 stars because it’s still cute!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love these advent calendar. This is our 4th year buying them. We started with just one, since they were pricey. After getting. Tired of the fighting, we now by one per kid every year. They cannot wait to open them each day!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome gift for my 5 year old! He loves legos and Star Wars so it was perfect. The product was high quality, and we were very happy with it! I have already recommended this calendar to a few people.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: ordered a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Its lego, so its 'good.' The price came down to a reasonable point ($21.00). The builds are pretty arcane, sometimes and you wonder 'what the heck is that?' but the kids liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Dresbach

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it so much that he kept sneaking more of the guys out but they were so special to homemade that he kept them separate from his other guys!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Davis

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Just opened first day and pieces are missing. There is a support number to call for missing pieces, but I don't want to be calling everyday and wait for missing pieces! I want to be able to open and successfully build on the appropriate day. Plus the support number is only open on Monday - Friday. Definite let down.
customer_reviews.author: Katsly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing selection
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing selection this year. The only main character minifig was Rose. And the final day is a generic snowman. Unlike past years Yoda Darth Maul Chewbacca etc
customer_reviews.author: Rich Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for husbands too!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he’s having so much fun assembling the little toys each night lol
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Perfect early Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute idea for any young Lego fan. Who doesn’t love a new little Lego toy everyday for 24 days? This is the 3rd year buying the Lego Advent Calendar ... my son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T.

customer_reviews.title: Sons favorite thing every year!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this every year!! Can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Beckybec

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: As expected, I always think it's not worth the money but its become tradition.so I keep buying it really should cost about 19.99 for what you get
customer_reviews.author: chrisanna nagle

customer_reviews.title: Kinda let down this year.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the LEGO Star Wars nativity sets I’ve bought. This being the fifth. It was by far the least impressive in the characters and builds.
customer_reviews.author: ffej

customer_reviews.title: Try again
customer_reviews.text: Usually enjoy Lego products but this calendar was very simplistic and not that exciting for 5 and 3 year olds. Plus half the lego characters were pictured on box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst selection ever!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the worst selection ever. I have been buying these Star Wars advent calendars for +6 years now and this one sucked the most.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended Lego gift set
customer_reviews.text: Great Lego gift, this is the 4th year my son has been doing the LEGO advent calendar. He enjoys each day opening and assembling each package.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for advent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and her boyfriend as a fun advent activity to do with their scripture reading. It was cute and fun even for young adults
customer_reviews.author: Fireflyfarm

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: tons of fun for my 5 y/o son. Wish it would have had more holiday related minifigs (like the ilder sets, santa suit yoda).
customer_reviews.author: OlyWa510

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic way to stay in touch with our nephew daily thru out the holiday while he made each LEGO piece! Gonna but another for 2019!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Duit

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable for 10 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old grandson enjoys these. He wishes there were more figures with it. Overpriced for what it is but legos are always pricey
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: great counter for kids
customer_reviews.text: My sons loves it for two reasons. One, gets new toy everyday. And two,helps him to keep track of how close it is till santa comes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are a little pricey for what you're getting, but they're cute and are fun to incorporate into other, larger Lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of teeny tiny legos that have no directions to put them together
customer_reviews.text: Grandson liked it but there were no directions. Often extra pieces or short pieces once we figured out what it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: My boys loves this calendar! The make different little items each year, so my kiddo is adding this years to last years collection.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina

customer_reviews.title: Shopping made Easy
customer_reviews.text: We get these Advent calendars every year. Great price and fast shipping, one less thing to remember or try to find elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hole In 1

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprises for kids good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a really nice advent calendar. The kids loved it. Good price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Sally

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Every morning he's asking for the calendar and he and his dad put the toys together. I'm glad we got this, it's a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this and its a great advent calendar. I didn't have to shop around for 24 different little toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kaibah

customer_reviews.title: Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old is really enjoying his advent calendar this year. I usually buy him inexpensive ones with chocolate candy. He has snuck open, and eaten all the candy in a couple of days. He seems to be enjoying opening a door a day this year. He can’t wait to see what he gets each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 13 year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: The first thing my son does in the morning is come check out what the next thing in his advent calendar is. He likes all of the things that come in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L. Brocka

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a big Lego fan, so getting a small Lego Star Wars toy every day to put together is just what he needed!
customer_reviews.author: Smokeymike

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Love the excitement this brought every morning. Never knowing what each door had in store, which made it exciting
customer_reviews.author: Melpease

customer_reviews.title: huge hit
customer_reviews.text: two boys shared the fun and loved everyday. good mixture of challenging assembly, easy assembly and no assembly
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 2018 version for sale in 2019
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this Lego Star Wars Advent Calendar is the 2018 version, but was listed for sale like a new version this season (2019). Unsuspecting elves brought the same advent calendar for my son that we got last year. Why would Santa send the same calendar two years in a row?
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morris

customer_reviews.title: L❤️VE this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LEGOs and Star Wars so this was SO perfect! She loved making a new one everyday - I hope they come up with another one for next year
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: pretty cool! wish it had had more lego mini people figurines but still cant go wrong with lego stuff.
customer_reviews.author: gary wigington jr

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. Everyday there’s a cool little LEGO thing to build. They’re little ships, figures, etc.
customer_reviews.author: tayloao

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed watching my son wake up and open these every day until Christmas. Cute items and I think there was 5 mini figures. He liked it.
customer_reviews.author: sndparker

customer_reviews.title: First thing on their minds
customer_reviews.text: Both my boys wake up wide-eyed and looking forward to these every morning. They have become an irreplceable tradition for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Decent set. I wish they had more popular characters.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Good variety and easy to follow instructions. I wish they had more popular characters from newer movies.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for the Lego lover in your family
customer_reviews.text: My family loved this. It's great that Lego offers a variety of advent calendars to suit a variety of fans.

customer_reviews.title: Great for older kids
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 11 yr old. He had fun putting them all together and seeing what was next.

customer_reviews.text: Great family experience. My 15yo actually asked for it one more year.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids...or adults.

customer_reviews.title: An annual tradition!
customer_reviews.text: Our third year getting these calendars and my now 8 year old loves them! It's also nice that you get a bunch of spare pieces and figs for other LEGO projects the rest of the year!

product_meta.title: LEGO 6213564 Star Wars Advent Christmas Countdown Calendar 75213 New 2018 Edition, Minifigures, Small Building Toys (307 Pieces), Multicolor
product_meta.description: Open the doors of this galactic 75213 LEGO Star Wars Advent calendar each day in December to discover themed LEGO minifigures, starships, vehicles and other collectibles. When you’ve opened all the doors, there’s even a foldout play mat with desert and ice-planet scenes for playing out epic Star Wars adventures. This great gift with 5 minifigures and 3 figures is the perfect way for fans of all ages to get ready for the holidays.
feature_bullets: Build 24 festive LEGO Star Wars characters and mini models and play with them on the foldout play mat!
Includes 5 minifigures, 3 figures and buildable mini models like a tie fighter and at-act
307 pieces – for boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 14
LEGO Star Wars building toys are compatible with all lego construction sets for creative building
